sense.def:
To go or look across somewhere
pomeni iti ali pogledati od ene strani do druge.

seg.quote: He turned his head and looked across at me.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj leži ali stoji
across something
stoji ali sega od ene do druge strani nečesa.

seg.quote: A straight line was ruled across the map.

sense.def:
Kar je
across a street or river
leži na drugi strani ceste ali reke.

seg.quote: He stared at the houses across the street.

sense.def:
Z besedo
across
opisujemo širino nečesa.

seg.quote: The bomb blasted a hole 200 kilometres across.
